name: Add new notifications to Telegram bot from new document generation processes finished in Plumsail Documents
description:
This template regularly checks for new document generation processes finished in Plumsail Documents and uses the retrieved information to create a new notification in Telegram Bot. 

This template was created by a 3rd party and not tested by Make. For any inquiries about the template, please reach out to the template creator: support@plumsail.com.
